nodes.text: An extended hilt was a lightsaber modification that extended the length of the weapon's hilt, making the weapon easier to wield with two hands. The modification cost 3,800 credits and was often used by beings with uncommon sizes or body shapes.
Extended hilts were mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
